item.title: Naruto Generations chapter 1 page 1
item.media:title: Naruto Generations chapter 1 page 1
item.media:description:
Yes! It's finally here, a scanned and enhanced version of my fan manga Naruto Generations!
 
Who are these two, why are they wearing Akatsuki cloaks? Read the next page to find out! ^^  

Next page: jpguchiha.deviantart.com/art/N…

So what do you think? Do you like it, dislike it, do you have any ideas or changes you would personally add? Whatever it is tell me in the comments below. 

Also if any of you have so ideas for Naruto Generations. Whether it be storylines, characters, or battle,  feel free to send me a note. I'd love w to hear your ideas.

Over 700 views! Thank you all so much!

800 views! Thank you all so much!!!

OVER 1,000 VIEWS!!!

item.title: Berserk-Inspired Otway
item.media:title: Berserk-Inspired Otway
item.media:description: Here’s my next drawing. This one is of Otway only a short while after he stops being Cowl, hence why he is ragged and bloodsoaked (remember that event leads his white cloak to be stained red with blood). This picture (like many of Otway/Cowl) is HEAVILY inspired by Berserk, this one in particular is literally a direct panel from it just flipped to match Otway’s left-handedness and obviously his armor and sword are (mostly) his own. So yeah, pretty happy with how this turned out. A lot of the armor shading didn’t quite turn out as well as hoped but some (like the feet) turned out pretty much perfect. His head gave me quite a bit of trouble here and it still isn’t quite aligned right. Big downside of drawing straight from a panel of Berserk, I now have to compare myself to the incredible artwork it has which is never really uplifting.
item.description: Here’s my next drawing. This one is of Otway only a short while after he stops being Cowl, hence why he is ragged and bloodsoaked (remember that event leads his white cloak to be stained red with blood). This picture (like many of Otway/Cowl) is HEAVILY inspired by Berserk, this one in particular is literally a direct panel from it just flipped to match Otway’s left-handedness and obviously his armor and sword are (mostly) his own. So yeah, pretty happy with how this turned out. A lot of the armor shading didn’t quite turn out as well as hoped but some (like the feet) turned out pretty much perfect. His head gave me quite a bit of trouble here and it still isn’t quite aligned right. Big downside of drawing straight from a panel of Berserk, I now have to compare myself to the incredible artwork it has which is never really uplifting.

item.title: Cephalopod Dot Matrix
item.media:title: Cephalopod Dot Matrix
item.media:description:
The Decisive Blow : A staple attack amongst battle mangas and giant robot animes. It is necessary for our hero to strike a cool pose while looking away from the explosion.
For after all, cool guys don't look at explosions.


I was also going for a very Mignola-esque inspired background hence the random tentacles.


3of 3 of his request:
Max:
luke-crowe.deviantart.com/favo…

item.title: Proxy High Oc - Veerus the Squid
item.media:title: Proxy High Oc - Veerus the Squid
item.media:description:
Application form for --> 

--------------------------------

Edit: Changed his ears and feet to make him look more human, damn those ears are still pointy though...but I really tried...

--------------------------------
Basic Information

Name: Veerus The Squid
Nicknames: Ink or Squid
Age: 17
Day of Birth: 1st January
Height: 6’'55
Gender: Male
Class: Green | Yellow | Red | Blue

Notable features:
Eyes are slitted with an inner line around them.
Hundreds of sharp teeth
Both ears are pierced
Hands / end of tail / ears and side of eyes are all dark grey from blood turning inky coloured due to prototype antidote effects.
Has a long arrow pointed tail.
Shirt has really long sleeves which can be tied together when he becomes temperamental or goes berserk in order to prevent him from harming anyone.
Scar on mouth and he is always wearing bandages on his nose and the side of his face.
His mask is normally always hanging on the side of his face.
Has a long fork-like yellow tongue.

Weapon of choices:
His claws and tail– Veerus prefers to use his claws in order to get up close and personal and he has a strange fascination with choking targets with his tail – he quite enjoys the slow and painful death.
Paint Brush Staff - Veerus has a large paint brush-like staff that he uses for combat and can launch ink from the brush ends.
-------------
Melanokinesis - Through the use of his ink like blood, Veerus can create, shape and manipulate ink seeping through his paws, including: moving ink, consistency/viscosity between solid and liquid. He can use his claws to write, scribe and tattoo without the needed tools by manipulating ink.
Melanokinetic Combat - Due to the veins being so evident on his hand, tail, feet and ears, Veerus is able to use ink manipulation in combination with his fighting style, such as creating claw like constructs on his hand, or increasing the length of tail, by adding ink. As a cheater, Veerus is also not above biting his tongue to make it bleed and then spitting out ink at opponents in order to blind and hinder their battle.

Personal Information

Likes: Squishy his Squid Plushie / Fighting / Drawing / strangling his victims with his tail / screams and begs for mercy / ink / Squids (as a pet) / sleeping during classes he doesn't understand / spring cleaning / singing / playing musical instruments / Hugs / seeing how many ‘F’s he can get in one term.

Dislikes: Being restrained by his jacket /cats & dogs / being around beings taller than him / anyone who eats squids / germs / mess / reading / WATER!!


Personality:
At face value, Veerus has quite childish, playful and sometime immature nature. He enjoys making jokes and is rarely seen without a smile. He likes to adventure out and do things for himself – even if he fails abysmally - because he hates taking orders or listening to authoritative figures, which often gets him in trouble - In reality though, he gets jealous very easily and can become violent when he wants something bad enough.
Veerus thrives in pain and blood related circumstances, while he enjoys the thought of killing and being covered with his victim's blood, he also welcomes and smiles at the rush for pain, taking it full on like some sort of drug.
He can be quite impulsive and is known to act before thinking, and although he enjoys a good fight and the amount of pain it causes to himself (and victims/opponents), he is not a fair character, and is certainly not afraid to cheat if it means winning as it’s very rare that he thinks before acting.


Short History:
Veerus was the second oldest of 4 children. He was born with an excessively weak immune system and was an on and off patient at the hospital due to it. His most common diagnosis being Septicemia. He survived each event, but it was costly on his already financially unstable parents.
His older sister was the only one to visit him at the hospital.

His parents - who despised weakness - only saw that Veerus was going nowhere academically, he wasn't all that smart compared to his siblings and he couldn't focus for long periods of time. They began to believe there was no potential in their continuous investment.
Veerus father took him to a medical students that had been kicked out and was attempting to redeem himself by creating a cure to weak immune systems.

He injected Veerus with a prototype antidote to test the outcome. Over the weeks, Veerus seemed to still get septicemia, but his antibodies fought back. His father was glad that he'd no longer have to spend the money at hospitals anymore.
The medical student did tests to check on Veerus who endured to pain for the chance of being cured.

13 weeks had passed after the first injection, and Veerus' hands and feet had turned a dark grey inky colour as the veins appeared, eventually they began to mutate and take claw-like appearances, Veerus even had a growth mutation at his coxis which slowly developed and became a tail.

Veerus himself, was fascinated by the change - he thought he was finally cured from his weakness. His family not so much. One night he heard his parents attempting to phone the police. Getting angry that his parents were always trying to change or improve him and not his siblings, he lost his temper and ended up strangling both his parents wanting to silence them from their constant shunning of his worth with his tail growth, before killing his two younger siblings in a fit of rage for being better than him. 

Veerus was unable to kill his elder sister - he physically couldn't do it, it was as if his mind refused him to. Instead he fled the family home and disappeared.

He was hiding out in the forest, when the sound of static alerted him, turning Veerus backed away to find a blank faced figure that was taller than him who said that his 'unique' abilities could be of use to the being .
Veerus became a Proxy of the Slenderman and was soon enlisted into Proxy High for schooling on being a proper Proxy.
 
Abilities

Skills and strengths:
Veerus is very strong, and he also has a high pain threshold and is able to endure a lot of physical damage before finally being knocked out. ...It has also made him a bit of a masochist
He’s good at Vocational subjects such as sports and music. He’s even a good artist.

Weaknesses:
Losing control of his temper often makes him chaotic and berserk-like, returning to primal instincts of fight, kill, and eat.
If touched by water, his ink would run and he’d lose his abilities, even becoming weak and a lot more susceptible to pain...it’s so bad that Veerus has actually adopted an extreme fear for water (he baths in Tomato pure).
Veerus is terrible at anything academic. Vocational he's okay with and he can get 'okay' grades, but when it comes to Math / english and even Science…he’s not got a clue and anything he can’t do –
Veerus is likely to give up on things he can't do, and his dyslexia doesn't help making it hard to learn.
He is scared of and goes quiet around anyone taller than him.
Veerus has a fear of weakness, and in subjects like Gym which he does good in, he will always push himself to the limits - even past his pain threshold - in order to show that he is not weak. 
Additional information:

Veerus is dyslexic
He has a weak immune system
He is Hydrophobic
His blood is inky black and he even cries and sweats ink rather than water.
He has a plush squid called ''Squishy''
Dislikes mess other than spilled guts and blood#
Despite his weak immune system he has strong stomach acid, and is quite likely to be seen eating rotten corpses or raw meat.
Likes singing. 
He plays the cello and saxophone, got taught by his mother when he was at home recovering from an illness.
Inkjet mask - Veerus' mask has a symbolic reference. The white background with inky images is a presentation that people perceive the world as black and white, but the fact it only covers one of his eyes is a way to show that he sees the world through different eyes</sub>

Was super fun to paint and the client was amazing, so many references provided <3

item.title: ...but I'm already perfect~
item.media:title: ...but I'm already perfect~
item.media:description:
Veerus the Squid -->thefallingpiano.deviantart.com… (c) me

-------------------------------------

Living in a family where strength and perfection is the only qualities accepted by your family can result in one's extreme addiction to being ''perfect''.

Veerus has OCD and high maintenance issues, in the idea that the only form of mess he can get on himself is blood. His appearance otherwise must be perfect.

...otherwise you get a psycho like mode.
item.description:
Veerus the Squid -->thefallingpiano.deviantart.com… (c) me

item.title: Otway
item.media:title: Otway
item.media:description: Here’s yet another drawing of Cowl (although calling him Otway is more accurate with this image, or what I jokingly call him “Basically Guts”). So yeah, this image of him would be after he betrays Nevekar so imagine his cape is red here (didn’t feel like coloring that in and I feel it looks really good as is). Anyway, onto the self-praise, I really like the way his cape turned out here, especially the portion behind his head. I’m also a big fan of the shading in general here. As for what I don’t like,… his hair isn’t the best and… the angles of his arms aren’t perfect when you really look at them. That’s all I’ve got for that really. Solid work, all around. I’d say my reading Berserk has had a positive effect my art.
item.description: Here’s yet another drawing of Cowl (although calling him Otway is more accurate with this image, or what I jokingly call him “Basically Guts”). So yeah, this image of him would be after he betrays Nevekar so imagine his cape is red here (didn’t feel like coloring that in and I feel it looks really good as is). Anyway, onto the self-praise, I really like the way his cape turned out here, especially the portion behind his head. I’m also a big fan of the shading in general here. As for what I don’t like,… his hair isn’t the best and… the angles of his arms aren’t perfect when you really look at them. That’s all I’ve got for that really. Solid work, all around. I’d say my reading Berserk has had a positive effect my art.

item.title: Berserk: A Page of Guts
item.media:title: Berserk: A Page of Guts
item.media:description: I've been drawing a lot of Guts lately. I wanted to fill up a whole page with him, Dragonslayer, and The Beast of Darkness, but I'm having trouble finding anywhere else to put more. All of these (excluding the top-left image) were based on moments in the Manga.
item.description: I've been drawing a lot of Guts lately. I wanted to fill up a whole page with him, Dragonslayer, and The Beast of Darkness, but I'm having trouble finding anywhere else to put more. All of these (excluding the top-left image) were based on moments in the Manga.

item.title: Collab - 'So maybe I'm a Masochist'
item.media:title: Collab - 'So maybe I'm a Masochist'
item.media:description:
Base--> pandabear-pixels.deviantart.co… (c) Pandabear-Pixels
Collab & Rabbit --> thefallingpiano.deviantart.com… (c) sonxfanchara
Veerus -->thefallingpiano.deviantart.com… (c) me

----------------------------------------

'So maybe I’m a masochist
I try to run but I don’t wanna ever leave
'Til the walls are goin’ up
In smoke with all our memories' Love the Way pt 2 Rihanna ft Eminem 

----------------------------------------

......I quite enjoy adding lyrics to pixel collabs for some reason, but Love the way you lie pt 2 seemed to fit - considering Veerus is a masochist~

....Anyway, I still fail at pixels...I know

item.title: Naruto Generations chapter 1 page 7
item.media:title: Naruto Generations chapter 1 page 7
item.media:description:
Pervious page: jpguchiha.deviantart.com/art/N…

Next page: jpguchiha.deviantart.com/art/N…

Page 1jpguchiha.deviantart.com/art/N…

So what do you think? Do you like it, dislike it, do you have any ideas or changes you would personally add? Whatever it is tell me in the comments below. 

Also if any of you have so ideas for Naruto Generations. Whether it be storylines, characters, or battle,  feel free to send me a note. I'd love w to hear your ideas.
item.description:
Pervious page: jpguchiha.deviantart.com/art/N…

Next page: jpguchiha.deviantart.com/art/N…

Page 1jpguchiha.deviantart.com/art/N…

So what do you think? Do you like it, dislike it, do you have any ideas or changes you would personally add? Whatever it is tell me in the comments below. 

Also if any of you have so ideas for Naruto Generations. Whether it be storylines, characters, or battle,  feel free to send me a note. I'd love w to hear your ideas.

item.title: 038-365 Two Sides of the Same Coin.
item.media:title: 038-365 Two Sides of the Same Coin.
item.media:description:
038-365 Two Sides of the Same Coin.

I drawn a request from a friend who roleplays Yukiteru Amano when he wins the Future Dairy War to become a god of time and space then happens to obtain Neon Genesis Evangelion Powers until after months of RP: He changed for the better and worst in terms of crossover powers to Tokyo Ghoul and Berserk into two in violent proportions.. As a Friend. I indulged some art for him: albiet not entirely my best work.
item.description:

I drawn a request from a friend who roleplays Yukiteru Amano when he wins the Future Dairy War to become a god of time and space then happens to obtain Neon Genesis Evangelion Powers until after months of RP: He changed for the better and worst in terms of crossover powers to Tokyo Ghoul and Berserk into two in violent proportions.. As a Friend. I indulged some art for him: albiet not entirely my best work.

item.title: SaW 4 w2 11
item.media:title: SaW 4 w2 11
item.media:description: sketch at work. this week was a very long, busy, tiring, and surprising. anywho this week sketch consist of a few animal drawing, shin chan, a scene from a old porky pig cartoon that was stuck in my head all week due to a cat in heat meowing in the street alllll night looooong. there also a unfinished guts from berserk, and Shepard ,tali, garrus and a pyjak from mass effect. hope you guys enjoy.

item.title: Kaoru Rintarou
item.media:title: Kaoru Rintarou
item.media:description: This is my first attempt at drawing a character without looking at any other pictures for help (hence the made up name), for a first attempt not too bad but i'm not completely happy with it, also there are 5 anime references in this picture (some less obvious than others) see if u can spot them.
item.description: This is my first attempt at drawing a character without looking at any other pictures for help (hence the made up name), for a first attempt not too bad but i'm not completely happy with it, also there are 5 anime references in this picture (some less obvious than others) see if u can spot them.

item.title: Fat Tessis - Berserk Costume Obese Edition
item.media:title: Fat Tessis - Berserk Costume Obese Edition
item.media:description:
Commission for
of the ever-so-thicc Tessis, which belongs to BlastshieldBuddy (His OC)!  :> 


Load of fun to come back to Tessis again, she's always a lot of wobbly joy to revisit!
And what better way to revisit her, than to see her dressed in a Halloween costume! :3

But, the spooks are not done yet, more to come very very soon! 

More Tessis here:






Also, I am open for commissions.
If you wish to know more, check out my commission journal!
Plumpchu is OPEN for Commissions!Plumpchu Commissions are back! :>
Let's draw some fatties! :3

Interested in commissioning me? Send me a Note, or e-mail me at plumpchu@gmail.com!
Cartoony Style!:
35$ USD per character

Painterly Style!:
35$ USD per character

I draw:
- Humans, anthro, furry, monsters, anything! 
- Any gender!
- Any size, but preferably chubby or bigger. You can go as fat as you want! <3
- Fan art and OCs/original characters
- Blueberry/Inflation
- Many kinks, unless I'm uncomfortable with it.
 
All payments are done through Paypal and I only accept USD as currency.

item.title: -THE FIGHT-
item.media:title: -THE FIGHT-
item.media:description:
THIS IS THE BEST DRAWING I'VE DONE IN MY LIFE
This is a christmas gift for my boyfriend :'D His OC Adam and his waifu (or husbando) Guts from Berserk

I suck at making background, but I'm pretty proud of it ;w;

Adam (left) - my boyfriend
Guts (right) - Kentaro Miura
